For sale is a 1999 Jeep Grand Cherokee. With the bullet proof in line v6. It has just under 191 miles. There are no rips or stains on the interior and it comes from a non-smoking home. All of the following things have been done in the last year and I have the shop receipts for most of it.

 Tune up with platinum spark plugs, coolant flush and fill, new radiator, alternator, serpentine belt, battery, brake pads (rotors were resurfaced), all four shocks, hood and tailgate lift support struts, new dash speakers(the jeep has an infinity sound system.), it also has very nice firestone destination tires that are less then two years old.

 I just had it into the shop to get it all checked out before I put it up for sale and it needed new sway bar links and bushings in the rear end and a new valve cover gaskets so I had that done. Along with an engine degreasing and a oil change.

 The only issue that I did not get to is the air bag light is on. It may need a new clock spring (about $80 for the part online.) or it just may need to be reconnected. Other then that it needs nothing. The 4 wheel dive works great and so does the heat so it is all ready for the upcoming winter. Clean and clear title in hand. Tabs are good until June. It has not been in any accidents. I am asking $3300 OBO. Email with any questions and thank you for your time.

rear sight and a high partridge front sight. Built on the “K” frame, 

the pistol has a high-polish factory blue finish with gold-filled 

wording and logo, and a beautiful set of S&W “Goncalo Alves” wooden 

checkered factory grips with S&W medallions. It is an understatement to 

say this is an attractive handgun! If you look real close you will see 

faint turn marks on the cylinder, and that’s about it as far as finish 

issues, the gun easily rates 95-98%+ condition. The bore on this gun is 

MINT, and double-action trigger pull is very smooth. Back in the day, 

the K-38 Masterpiece was coveted by Competition Shooters, now 

Collectors love them, and you will not find a nice one than this one, 

this is the gun you want to upgrade to!

title: For Trade:  LAHTI M-40 (Husqvarna) WWII *RARE*
postcontent: This is the Lahti M-40. It was made in Sweden during 1944 and is not a military surplus gun. This design is based off of its Finnish counterpart the Lahti L-35 which is based off of the Luger P-08. This particular gun is one of only 3000 made and sent to Denmark. No rust, excellent condition and has all bluing. Comes with one 7 round mag. Fires the 9mm Luger. I encourage you to research this gun as its history and design are fascinating!

title: For Sale:  Pistol Class: NRA F.I.R.S.T. Steps Pistol
postcontent:
The National Rifle Association's (NRA'S) Firearm Instruction, Responsibility, Safety Training (F.I.R.S.T. Steps) is a three hour class to provide professional, certified training to those who have not had the benefit of formal training, or those who are returning to shooting agian and need a refresher class with the most up-to-date information. 

The FIRST Class provides classroom instruction and hands-on practical application of the lessons taught using live-fire range shooting in a fun environment. Students enjoy learning and practicing how to safely handling and accurately shoot during this introduction. 

Students benefit from learning the NRA’s rules for safe gun handling; Handgun components and operation; modern ammunition types and selection; shooting fundamentals; pistol care and maintanance; and will become qualified to attend more advanced opportunities for skill development such as Concealed Carry Handgun, Defensive Handgun Level I, and other courses.. 

If you have a group of five or more persons, we can make arrangements to schedule a course on a day of your choosing. Ask about a group discount rate, too. Contact us today. E-mail: REDACTED, website: www.PatriotTAC.com, and be sure to Like us on Facebook.

title: For Sale:  Federal 22LR and 9mm, Winchester 22LR and Remington 22LR
location: All four corners of, Wisconsin, United States
postcontent:
Just looking to get back what I paid for them. Sound familiar? Why do they frequently seem to have 3, 6, or 9 boxes? Because 3 is the walmart limit. Take your wife and a friend and you can buy up to 9. Want to know what these clowns actually paid and how bad they are reaming your behind?

Much of what is posted on this site came from Walmart. I have been lucky enough to be there at the right time and able to get what I need to keep going to the range. I do not sell any of my ammo, I shoot it.
Here are some prices that I can back up with receipts. Some quite recent. I did not include tax, but I never paid as much in sales tax as I did for the ammo, doubling the prices here.

 1,000 Round box of Winchester M-22 LR $49.99
 550 Round box of Federal 36 grain copper plated 22LR $23.97
 555 Round box of Winchester white box 22LR $23.97
 333 Round box of Winchester white box 22LR $15.17
 525 Round box of Remington Golden bullets 22LR $22.97
 225 Round box of Remington Golden bullets 22LR $10.27
 50 Round box of Federal Champion 9mm luger $14.97
 325 Round box of Federal Auto Match 22LR $18.97  (although these are getting rare and the supply seems to be drying up in my area)

 These are just the ones I can find receipts for that I bought over the last 5 months!
 The prices have gone up from last year, but not all that much!
 It takes a lot of patience and persistence to get this ammo at Walmart. I sometimes check in everyday on the way to work or on my way home. If I am lucky, I average a successful purchase every 3-6 weeks. That's' all it takes to keep me shooting, and set a box aside for when I don't find any.
 Keep buying from these clowns at their mega inflated prices and they'll keep packing it in your rear.
 By the way,to all you scalpers who will send me nasty emails for exposing you. I will post your email addresses and comments. So you might think twice and keep your comments to yourselves.

title: For Sale:  NIB Kel-Tec P-3AT .380acp
postcontent:
I have a brand new Kel-Tec P-3AT .380acp handgun for sale. 

The P-3AT is a semi-automatic, locked breech pistol, chambered for the .380 Auto cartridge. It has been developed from our highly successful P-32 pistol with negligible increase in weight and size. The slidestop has been eliminated and the magazine capacity reduced to 6 rounds due to the larger cartridge. The firing mechanism is double action only. The magazine has a 6 round capacity. The KEL-TEC P-3AT is the lightest .380 Auto pistol ever made. Thanks to its locking dynamics and superior ergonometry, perceived recoil and practical accuracy are comparable to much larger guns. The P-3AT is mainly intended for plainclothes police officers as a secondary weapon, or for concealed carry by licensed citizens. The small grip size and light trigger pull make the P-3AT ideal for female shooters.

The P-3AT has five main component groups: barrel, slide, firing mechanism, grip, and magazine. The barrel is made of SAE 4140 ordnance steel, heat treated to 48 HRC. The slide is also 4140 steel, and contains the firing pin and the extractor. The rectangular frame is machined from solid 7075-T6 aluminum and houses the firing mechanism. The trigger connects via a transfer bar to the hammer. The hammer is driven by a novel free floating extension spring. The light weight firing pin transmits the energy of the hammer to ignite the primer. After firing, the hammer block holds the hammer away from the firing pin, providing a mechanical safety.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

title: For Sale:  NEW BLACKHOLE WEAPONRY AR-15 CARBINE 16" SS 1:8 BARREL
postcontent:
Brand NEW Black Hole Weaponry AR-15 Carbine 16" M-4 Profile Stainless Steel 1:8 Polygonal Rifled Barrel 5.56 Chamber

PRICE: $225 Firm.  Cash. (willing to ship and accept paypal - buyer pays shipping)

Blackhole Weaponry Barrels employ the use of 416R, match grade stainless steel. BHW Barrels specialize in Polygonal rifling; The shape of the lands and grooves are based on a circle, so there are no sharp corners or edges for the bullet to conform into. This means there is a tight seal and thus less bullet deformation. This rifling form is unique in its ability to allow the bullet to be centered and fully supported by the barrel’s bore.This arc shaped rifling has long been held in very high regard for its accuracy, increased velocity, reduced gas cutting and ease of cleaning. 
Caliber: 5.56x45mm (NATO)
Barrel Length: 16" M-4 Profile
Gas System: Carbine Length
Barrel Material: 416 Stainless Steel
Barrel Finish: Matte Black
Rifling: 1:8 Polygonal 3 groove
M4 feed ramp is included
Under Handguard: 0.88 inches
In front of gas block: 0.73 inches
.750" diameter at gas block
Threading (TPI): 1/2x28"
Weight: 2.0lbs
Magnetic particle inspections and other non-destructive testing performed on barrels by manufacturer

title: For Sale:  Fabrique Nationale FN49 FN 49 Hakim 7.92MM
postcontent: This is an FN 49 made for the Egyptian Military by FN and is chambered in 7.92MM Mauser (8MM Mauser).  Easier on the body than the M1 Garand.  It is a rifle with some character.  Has a few armory stock repairs and the original barrel nut has been removed and replaced with a flash suppressor/hider.  I have fired this rifle and it is an excellent shooter and functions great.  It has the brass buttplate with trap door and a clear and distinct Egyptian crest on the receiver.  Stock is in great shape and repairs are solid.  Standard fixed 10 round mag designed to load with strippers.  Also equipped with a brass Egyptian unit disk in the stock.  The bayonet lug has been removed from this rifle.  Metal is in good shape...all of the original black finish has disappeared and metal is turning to plum and patina.  Some discoloration but no rust or pitting.  Bore is in good shape.  Will consider reasonable cash offer.  Have some 8MM milsurp ammo available as well.   Cash is King..not really looking to trade anything but will consider a partial trade on a nice Glock 9MM  or a CZ P07 Duty 9MM with cash on your end..  Email for additional pics.

postcontent:
First up, the travel humidor. This thing will fit in with all your gun cases! $30
Features:


Airtight... Watertight... Crushproof
Super-strong ABS Molded Plastic Construction
Closed cell foam is Airtight and Watertight

Manufacturer's Lifetime Guarantee
Locking Clasp
Made in the USA

The sticker ring in picture one has been cleaned off. I don't recall ever actually using the element as I generally smoked one cigar after the other when I was using this travel case. Keeps smokes VERY good, have used it on more than a few camping trips. You can fit a lot more in this case if you take the foam out (I have fit 42 in this one, XI18-24)


Next are the Padrons. Folks, I can't tell you how awesome and consistent Padron cigars are. These particular cigars are the king of their line ups. The Padron 1926 80th Anniversary Perfectos and the Padron 1926 40th Anniversary.

The 80th Anniversaries retail for $31. These were purchased in 2008 and have pretty much been sitting since then, with me occasionally taking them out to look at them lovingly. The two Perfectos on the bottom are Maduros, the rest are naturals. I'm going to sell these for $29 each

The 40th Anniversaries retail for $26. These were also purchased in 2008 and have pretty much been sitting since then, with me occasionally taking them out to look at them lovingly. These belicosos I believe are all maduros, but honestly, I couldn't tell you, they all look dark to me. I'm going to sell these for $24 each.

These prices are firm. I am not willing to trade on these right now, I'm trying to fund my 1911 purchase. I will however ship the smokes on my dime. Buy 1, buy 5, I don't care. I will send them first class if you buy 1, priority if you buy more. Or you could meet me where I work in Lincoln, MA (Outside of Hanscom AFB) or in Nashua, NH (my home town).

The travel humidor is pick up only, same places.

I will take PayPal. Don't worry about the fee, I'll pay it. Like I said, just trying to fund my 1911, and get people some quality kick as cigars that have been lovingly aged for you. If I can sell them all, I'd be pretty friggen happy. If you want to buy all of the cigars at once, because that's the way you roll, I'll give you 10% off ($294 x .90 = $264. It's like getting one of them for free!)

So as a review: I take PayPal, and will ship only the cigars on my dime. If you would rather pick them up, I live in Nashua, NH and work in Lincoln, MA (outside of Hanscom). The humidor is PICK UP ONLY.

Buy these smokes, they will curl your toes, blow up your skirt and put hair on your chest. One warning though, you may never want to smoke anything else.......

title: For Sale:  *Price Drop* Bushmaster AR15 with upgrades
postcontent:
For sale is my precision XM15.  This rifle started life as a Bushmaster Varmint/Predator rifle.  I decided that I did not like the barrel on it so I sent the gun to Compass Lake engineering in Florida to do some work to it.  
They replaced the barrel with a Krieger premium SS barrel, and then turned it down under the handguard and cut deep full length fluting and fitted a custom made and lathe turned removable muzzle brake on it.  The new bolt was headspaced to the barrel correctly to ensure the most accuracy possible.  A new Nordic vented handguard was fitted, along with a low profile railed gas block.  They installed their two stage match trigger system and tuned it for correct function.  It also has a Magpul MOE stock and a Target grip installed.  The scope is available if you would like it, it is a SWFA SS 10X scope in SWFA heavy rings, if you dont want that I will discount the rifle $200, but I will not sell the scope separately.
Overall this is a fantastic shooting rifle that will make little holes at long distances with ease.  It has been 100% reliable for me but I am getting into some different shooting disciplines so it needs to go.  If I add up the entire cost of buying and building this rifle it is over twenty five hundred dollars, but I am asking only $1600 with the scope and mounts, $1400 without them. I am not interested in trades, I need the cash.
Please text or call me at REDACTED for any questions you have or to set up a time to meet.  Thank you.

Delivering the same low-maintenance, rugged reliability as the full sized SR9, the lightweight Ruger SR9c 9mm Luger Compact Pistol packs the features today's shooters demand into a compact package. Perfectly balanced for comfortable and controlled shooting, the SR9c features the same slim, ergonomic grip, narrow slide, and short reach from the backstrap to the trigger as its larger predecessor. The structurally rigid, recoil-reducing, glass-filled nylon frame features a built-in Picatinny rail for modern handgun accessories. Black alloy steel slide. New serrations are located on the front portion of the slide, making it easier to both manipulate the slide and to press check the chamber. Modern blocker. Unique reversible backstrap allows shooter to choose a flat or arched backstrap for a custom grip and feel. Easy to reach, ambidextrous manual trigger safety and magazine release. Weight: 23.4 oz. Capacity: 17+1 rounds (magazine features grip extension).

 By completing this class you will then be eligible to apply for your Kansas Carry Conceal License through the Attorney General's office.

title: For Sale:  9mm AP9 Similar to TEC-9
postcontent:
A. A ARMS INC made in mint hill N.C around the 80s. the gun is great condition and supper clean. comes with a standard clip and a 32 round clip.
you cant find many of these any more so 400 firm 

call or text: 541-948-514four Thanks

HISTORY:The AP-9 is a pistol that was manufactured by AA Arms and distributed by Kimel Industries, Inc of Indian Trail, North Carolina, US AAArms began distributing the AP-9 in the early 1990s and did so until 2001. The AP-9 looks like a small submachinegun, but has no automatic fire function. This firearm is basically a large pistol that looks very much like the Intratec TEC-9.
The standard AP9 has a 5" barrel; the AP-9 target began with a 12" barrel (AP-9/12), but this was later reduced to 11" (AP-9/11 Target); they both have a separate fore end and a fluted barrel. These firearms were banned by most states after the passage of the Federal Assault Weapons Ban and other pieces of legislation, even after more cosmetic changes designed to make them appear to be less threatening. After the Federal Assault Weapons Ban of 1994 a ten round magazine was introduced. Original magazine capacities included 5 round, 10 round, 20 round and 32 round capacities.
